description: at the moment it's possible to call "nova flavor-list" to list all defined flavors. but it's not possible to use "nova" for managing existing flavors or to add new flavors. this functionality is only available in "nova-manage". i think the functionality has to be moved from "nova-manage" to "nova".
title: missing flavor handling in 'nova'

comments.content: at the moment it's possible to call "nova flavor-list" to list all defined flavors. but it's not possible to use "nova" for managing existing flavors or to add new flavors. this functionality is only available in "nova-manage". i think the functionality has to be moved from "nova-manage" to "nova".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~berendt

comments.content: Yes, but that is more of a blueprint than a bug. We do agree, though :)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
